title: Breakingviews TV: Italy reborn?
text:
Breakingviews TV: Italy reborn? 8:30pm GMT - 45:19 
Demand is up; exports are strong. But there’s still work to do. Ahead of a March 4 election, Enel CEO Francesco Starace and UBI boss Victor Massiah discuss policy priorities and ways to boost Italy’s potential with ENI Chair Emma Marcegaglia and UniCredit’s Fabrizio Saccomanni. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Demand is up; exports are strong. But there’s still work to do. Ahead of a March 4 election, Enel CEO Francesco Starace and UBI boss Victor Massiah discuss policy priorities and ways to boost Italy’s potential with ENI Chair Emma Marcegaglia and UniCredit’s Fabrizio Saccomanni.
